about_the_game:
RA RA BOOM is a fast-paced, four-player co-op beat ‘em up driven by a meaningful coming-of-age narrative following a cheer squad super group from space, in a fight to save humanity from AI robots gone rogue.

A NEW TAKE ON THE BEAT 'EM UP GENRE.

Building on the game’s core frenetic beat 'em up 2D action co-op gameplay, RA RA BOOM incorporates huge boss battles and ranged attacks to create diverse gameplay within the traditional beat ‘em up genre.

UPGRADE YOUR CHARACTER.

Each member of the squad will sport upgradable combos for both melee and ranged attacks featuring light, heavy and special attacks to keep each fight fresh and fierce.

DYNAMIC LANE SYSTEM.

RA RA BOOM also augments traditional beat 'em up gameplay with its unique integrated lane system. Integrating horizontal lanes naturally into the hand-drawn environments, you’ll be able to tell which enemy you’re targeting with a flurry of furious blows - whether using up-close melee strikes or attacking from a distance using ranged weapons.

FEATURES

Diverse episodic levels - From swamps and sewers to sprawling amusements parks
Dynamic lane system - Quickly switch between lanes to strategically target multiple opponents
Choose your character - Pick the playstyle that suits you with each character offering a fresh way to play
Tech tree upgrades - Choose from an array of options to enhance your character with a multitude of build options
Couch Co-op - Have friends and family join the ninja cheerleader battle and save the Earth together!
